channel.title: Annoying fishing problem
channel.description:
Hi, my server is a 317 Delta. (Don't hate on Delta. :P)
I have a little problem with fishing.. whenever a player attempts to use a small fishing net, harpoon or lobster cage he/she will be disconnected. But just clicking on the spots causes no disruption in the server.
My question is, how do I stop them from disconnecting when the use their fishing items on the fishing spots?
Thank you, Godspeed and party on.

item.title: Annoying fishing problem
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
